front.title: SDP General Purpose Media Descriptors for H.261 and H.263

abstract.t: This document defines new SDP parameters using general purpose media descriptors to describe video codecs used in interactive multimedia applications. Currently this document covers H.261 and H.263 but more codecs are expected to leverage the SDP syntax defined by this document. These parameters aid in negotiating parameters for video sessions. Examples of using the SDP video syntax to setup a video call using the SDP offer answer model are included.
